title: kalyANa vaibhavam kANIrE
sahitya:
kalyANa vaibhavam kANIrE engaL kayalkaNNi kalait-tiru IshanArin karam piDitta


anupallavi

  mallikai tanga mAlai palvagai vaira vaLai mei nirkka mANikkam minniDa mAtangi vanda


caraNam    pangaiyan pAmagaLum pannagan tirumagaLum nandiyum nAradanum tumburu munigaLUm
gandharvar kadir matiyum karimukhan kandanum koNDADi kUDi ninrAr kaNDAr ArpaTTamenrAr
